title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. XXX of 2020)), with the consent of the
heading: 3. Regulation 3(1) of the Principal Regulation is amended by substituting
text_raw:
3. Regulation 3(1) of the Principal Regulation is amended by substituting 

for the definition of “newly qualified teacher” or “NQT” the following: 

“‘newly qualified teacher’ or ‘NQT’ means a teacher who meets the 
Council’s requirements in terms of qualification but has not completed 
the required period of professional practice, including a teacher whose 
qualifications have been recognised under Route 1, paragraph 4 or 
Route 2, paragraph 4 of the Schedule;”.
text_norm: 3 regulation 3(1) principal regulation amended substituting definition newly qualified teacher nqt following newly qualified teacher nqt mean teacher meet council requirement term qualification completed required period professional practice including teacher whose qualification recognised route 1 paragraph 4 route 2 paragraph 4 schedule

heading: 4. (1) Subject
text_raw:
4. (1) Subject 
the exceptional 
circumstances arising due to the Covid-19 emergency, a

State which, in the opinion of the Council, would be assessed as 
equivalent under paragraph 3, with no requirement for the

(4) 
situation resulting from the spread in the State of the disease

The Minister for Education consents to, and approves of, the making of the 
foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 July, 2020. 

NORMA FOLEY, 

Minister for Education and Skills.

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. XXX of 2020)), with the consent of the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Teaching Council (Registration) Regulations 
2016 to enable the Teaching Council to register extra teachers in order to 
address the public emergency caused by the Covid-19 pandemic. 

These Regulations may be cited as the Teaching Council (Registration) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [269] 7
